name: Farmer Maxwell
description:
Farmer Maxwell moves to Cube Island to retreat from busy life back home and go in search for the mystical Magic Corn Seeds. Unfortunately, the island was infested with the native Crop-Eating Cubes. As a result, Max's crops were gobbled up by the foul beasts. It's now up to Maxwell to defeat the sinister blocks and regrow his farm with the mystical seeds. 

I made this thing as part of an online game development camp made by a company called BlackRocket. It was made using a Unity template, a bit of creativity, and 4 days I wasted to make this.

  • Over 70 seeds to collect and 20 enemies to defeat!
  • Collect all the seeds and enemies to win!
  • Explore the amazing island and what it has to offer!

Controls:

WASD - Move

Q and E - Move Camera

Space - Jump
